name: Edgar's Christmas (eng, rus)
description:
"Edgar's Christmas"- is not a Christmas fairytale. It is a real horror, which can happen with any of us in the winter.  Protect your house, warn your friends and, finally, destroy all disgusting creatures, eager to gobble up under the guise of holidays. This game has an interesting plot and atmosphere. It includes adventure, pixel art shooter and roguelike.

This is a computer game, which we (me and my friend) made for three weeks.

Play online here (ENG): http://compassionate-curie-f279b7.bitballoon.com

Play online here (RUS): http://stoic-brahmagupta-e40274.bitballoon.com
